title: Software Developer
description:
Develop and implement new software programs
Maintain and improve the performance of existing software and identify area for modification in existing programs and subsequently develop these modifications
Design and update software database
Test and maintain software products to ensure strong functionality and optimization
Build efficient, testable and reusable PHP code in CakePHP
Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges
Manage code documentation and version control
requirements: A degree and a technical background
Degrees in Computer Science, Computer Software Engineering, or Software Programming and Development are advantageous
Knowledge and interest in computer systems and the latest technologies
Ability to learn new technologies quickly
Strong knowledge of the PHP web framework CakePHP
Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
Familiarity with limitations of PHP as a platform and its workarounds
Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
